trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A KeyEventArgs, which specifies the key the user pressed and whether any modifier keys (CTRL, ALT, and SHIFT) were pressed at the same time, is passed with each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event.
trans-unit.target: En KeyEventArgs som angir nøkkelen brukeren har trykket og om noen modifikator-nøkler (CTRL, ALT og SKIFT) trykker samtidig, er sendt med hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event occurs when the user presses any key.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>inntreffer når brukeren trykker en tast.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event occurs when the user releases the key.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>hendelsen oppstår når brukeren slipper nøkkelen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>

trans-unit.source: Duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> events occur each time the key repeats, if the key is held down, but only one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event is generated when the user releases the key.
trans-unit.target: Duplisert <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>hendelser inntreffer hver gang nøkkelen gjentar, hvis nøkkelen holdes nede, men bare én <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>hendelsen genereres når brukeren slipper nøkkelen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event also occurs when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>hendelsen oppstår også når en tast.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs> is passed with each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event, and specifies the character that was composed as a result of each key press.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs>er sendt med hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>hendelse, og angir tegnet som ble opprettet som følge av hver key trykk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hendelsen modellen, kan du se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> representing the key that was pressed, combined with any modifier flags that indicate which CTRL, SHIFT, and ALT keys were pressed at the same time.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> som representerer nøkkelen som ble brukt, kombinert med modifikator flagg som angir hvilken CTRL, SKIFT og ALT nøkler trykker samtidig.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are obtained be applying the bitwise OR (|) operator to constants from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Mulige verdier hentes bruke eller bitvis | operatoren til konstanter fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the ALT key was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om ALT-tasten ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ALT key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis ALT-tasten trykket; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the CTRL key was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om CTRL-tasten ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the CTRL key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis CTRL-tasten trykket; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event was handled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om hendelsen ble behandlet.

trans-unit.source: Handled is implemented differently by different controls within Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Håndtert implementeres annerledes av forskjellige kontroller i Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: For controls like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> which subclass native Win32 controls, it is interpreted to mean that the key message should not be passed to the underlying native control.
trans-unit.target: For kontrolltypene som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>som deaktiverer opprinnelig Win32 kontrollerer, tolkes for å bety at key meldingen ikke skal sendes til den underliggende opprinnelige kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If you set `Handled` to true on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, that control will not pass the key press `events` to the underlying Win32 text box control, but it will still display the characters that the user typed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir `Handled` til true for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, at kontrollen ikke bestått key Trykk `events` underliggende tekstbokskontroll for Win32, men vil fortsatt vise tegnene som brukeren skrev.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to prevent the current control from receiving a key press, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.SuppressKeyPress%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil forhindre at gjeldende kontroll mottar en nøkkel Trykk, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.SuppressKeyPress%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.SuppressKeyPress%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to bypass the control's default handling; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to also pass the event along to the default control handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å hoppe over kontrollen er som standard behandler; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> også sende hendelsen langs til standardbehandlingsprogram for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard code for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter tastatur-koden for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> value that is the key code for the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdi som er viktige for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key data for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter key-data for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: You can use constants from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> to extract information from the KeyData property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke konstanter fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>til å hente informasjon fra egenskapen KeyData.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: Use the bitwise AND operator to compare data returned by KeyData with constants in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> to obtain information about which keys the user pressed.
trans-unit.target: Operatoren bitvis og sammenligne data som returneres av KeyData med konstanter i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>å få informasjon om hvilke taster brukeren trykket.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a specific modifier key was pressed, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Control%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Shift%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Alt%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå om en bestemt tast ble brukt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Control%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Shift%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Alt%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Alt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Shift%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> representing the key code for the key that was pressed, combined with modifier flags that indicate which combination of CTRL, SHIFT, and ALT keys was pressed at the same time.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> som representerer key koden for nøkkelen som ble brukt, kombinert med modifikator flagg som indikerer hvilken kombinasjon av CTRL, SKIFT og ALT trykket samtidig.

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard value for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter tastaturverdien for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The integer representation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.KeyCode*> property.
trans-unit.target: Heltall-representasjon av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.KeyCode*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.KeyCode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the modifier flags for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter modifikator flaggene for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The flags indicate which combination of CTRL, SHIFT, and ALT keys was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Flaggene angi hvilken kombinasjon av CTRL, SKIFT og ALT ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a specific modifier key was pressed, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Control%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Shift%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Alt%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå om en bestemt tast ble brukt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Control%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Shift%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Alt%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Alt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Shift%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: Modifier flags can be combined with bitwise OR.
trans-unit.target: Modifikator flagg kan kombineres med eller bitvis.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> value representing one or more modifier flags.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdien som representerer en eller flere modifikator flagg.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the SHIFT key was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om SKIFT ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SHIFT key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis SKIFT trykket; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the key event should be passed on to the underlying control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om nøkkelen hendelsen skal sendes til underliggende kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can assign `true` to this property in an event handler such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> in order to prevent user input.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilordne `true` for denne egenskapen i en hendelsesbehandling som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>for å hindre brukerinndata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: Setting SuppressKeyPress to `true` also sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Angi SuppressKeyPress til `true` angir også <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A>til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key event should not be sent to the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis hendelsen nøkkelen ikke kan sendes til kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
